item.title: Humble Beginnings
item.description: In today’s world, major tech companies, educators and policymakers are pushing for STEM education. As a mentor at Resilient Coders and a Technology teacher at the Margarita Mu√±iz Academy, I strongly believe in the economic advancement of youth for the betterment of society. My beginnings with technology starts in early childhood. During the weekends I visited my father and spent most of the time with my brother Robinson. Robinson, an electrical engineer from Dominican Republic, was my mentor and role-model.
